sense.def:
Kadar je človek
alone
, z njim ni drugih.

seg.quote: Barbara spent most of her time alone in the flat.

sense.def:
Kdor je
alone
, nima sorodnikov ali prijateljev.

seg.quote: I had never felt so alone and without hope in my life.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
alone with another
, je skupaj še z nekom, ne da bi bil navzoč še kdo tretji.

seg.quote: I was alone with the attendant.
We'd never spent such a long time alone together.

sense.def:
To do something alone
pomeni narediti tisto brez tuje pomoči.

seg.quote: I was left to bring up my two children alone.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
alone does something
, tisto stori samo on.

Kadar nekaj
consists of one idea or feature alone
, vsebuje le eno idejo ali lastnost.

seg.quote: Pride alone prevented her from giving up.
